markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Electric Eelskin](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2805)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=637" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 230 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 950 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=41)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Shining, slippery eelskin covers the plates of this _+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=147) [greater slick](/Equipment.aspx?ID=289) [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)_. The armor gives you the ability to breathe water and grants you a +2 item bonus to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks to [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39) and [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks you attempt in the water. 

**Activate—Unleash Charge** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** You cast a 2nd-rank [_thunderstrike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1721) with a DC of 29.

**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of _thunderstrike_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Electric Eelskin
